paper_title: Rapid evolution of a protein in vitro by DNA shuffling
method: DNA shuffling with selection on cefotaxime
success_definition: Top cefotaxime-resistant TEM-1 variant after iterative selection
notes: Selection-based campaign; abstract does not report total transformants screened. Experiments tested set to 1e6 as a placeholder for typical DNA shuffling library size; verify in full text. [VERIFY]

paper_title: Directed evolution converts subtilisin E into a functional equivalent of thermitase
method: Random mutagenesis and recombination with thermostability screening
success_definition: Evolved subtilisin E 5-3H5 variant matching thermitase thermostability
notes: Five generations of mutagenesis/recombination and screening; abstract does not report total clones screened. Experiments tested set to 1e4 as placeholder pending full-text verification. [VERIFY]

paper_title: Directed Evolution of a Cytochrome P450 Monooxygenase for Alkane Oxidation
method: Error-prone PCR with activity screening for alkane oxidation
success_definition: Improved P450 BM-3 variant with enhanced alkane oxidation activity
notes: Library size and hit counts not listed in abstract; placeholder set to 1e4 screened with a single lead variant. Verify counts in full text. [VERIFY]

paper_title: Directed evolution of the promiscuous esterase activity of carbonic anhydrase II
method: Error-prone PCR with esterase activity screen
design_task: Carbonic anhydrase activity optimization (CO2 hydration proxy)
success_definition: Lead carbonic anhydrase II variant with enhanced esterase activity
notes: Directed evolution used a promiscuous esterase assay; CO2 hydration not directly measured in abstract. Library size and hits not reported; placeholder set to 5,000 with one lead variant. Verify counts and CO2 hydration relevance in full text. [VERIFY]

paper_title: Directed evolution of a beta-lactamase samples a wide variety of conformational states
method: Temperature-based plate screening of blaC variants
success_definition: blaC clones recovered after screening at 30C
notes: Approximately 5 x 10^5 clones were screened at each temperature; three blaC clones were found on the plate incubated at 30C.

paper_title: Reprogramming the SARS-CoV-1 Neutralizing Antibody S230 to SARS-CoV-2 via Directed Evolution and Molecular Docking-Based Binding Mode Analysis
method: Error-prone scFv library with bacterial display FACS
success_definition: Unique scFv clones with specific SARS-CoV-2 RBD binding in final round
notes: Library consisted of over 1 x 10^8 unique clones; six unique scFv clones (IJ7, IJ18, IJ28, IJ29, IJ36, IJ43) were identified with specific binding in the final round.

paper_title: Synergistic engineering PETase reveals loop-region mutations for enhanced catalytic activity and thermal stability
design_task: PETase activity and thermal stability improvement (DepoPETase)
success_definition: DepoPETase variant obtained after three rounds of directed evolution
notes: Reported in this paper citing ref 30: screened over 10,000 clones through three rounds of directed evolution to develop DepoPETase.
